id: Exclusive: Khashoggi sons issue emotional appeal for the return of their father's body
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Nic Robertson, CNNUpdated 4:17 AM ET, Mon November 5, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)The sons of murdered journalist Jamal Khashoggi issued an emotional appeal for the return of their father's body, in their first interview since he was killed in the Saudi consulate in Istanbul a month ago.
